//rfce import React from 'react' import "./Header.css"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import SearchIcon from "@material-ui/icons/Search" import ShoppingBasketIcon from "@material-ui/icons/ShoppingBasket" import { useStateValue } from './StateProvider'; function Header() { const [{ basket }] = useStateValue(); console.log(basket); return
Hello Qazi Sign In
Returns & Orders
Your Prime
{basket?.length}
} export default Header
